issue.title: [C++] Deprecate arrow::MakePrimitiveArray
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1511](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1511). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I thought this was already deprecated in favor of `internal::MakeArray`. We should consider making this function and `internal::ArrayData` part of the public API instead.
